required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 1, Open-label Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of MEDI0680 (AMP-514) in Combination With MEDI4736 in Subjects With Advanced Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Open-label Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of MEDI0680 (AMP-514) in Combination With MEDI4736 in Subjects With Advanced Malignancies

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of MEDI0680 (AMP-514) given in combination with MEDI4736.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Acceptable number of subjects with adverse events as a measure of safety and tolerability
primary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drugs until 90 days after the last dose of study drugs
primary_outcome.description: Determination of maximum tolerated dose (MTD) to be assessed by number of AEs and SAEs, laboratory evaluations, vital signs, physical examinations, and electrocardiogram results

secondary_outcome.measure: Antitumor activity of MEDI0680 (AMP-514) in combination with MEDI4736 in subjects with advanced malignancies
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drugs until end of study
secondary_outcome.description: Measured by OR, DC, DoR, PFS and OS

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose through 12 months after last dose of study drugs
secondary_outcome.description: Individual concentrations in serum including peak and trough concentration

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drugs until 90 days after last dose of study drugs
secondary_outcome.description: Immunogenicity measured by presence of detectable ADAs

other_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drugs until 90 days after last dose of study drugs
other_outcome.description: To assess drug exposure and response to treatment

other_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drugs until end of study
other_outcome.description: To assess drug exposure and response to treatment

other_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drugs through the last dose of study drugs
other_outcome.description: To assess cell populations with drug exposure and response to treatment

other_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drugs until 90 days after last dose of study drugs
other_outcome.description: to assess pre and post treatment levels with response to treatment with study drugs

other_outcome.measure: Expression of biomarkers within the tumor microenvironment
other_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drugs until end of study
other_outcome.description: To determine the molecules and biomarkers present in the tumor microenvironment pre and post dose

other_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drugs through end of study
other_outcome.description: to determine changes in gene expression from baseline

other_outcome.time_frame: From screening through end of study
other_outcome.description: To determine the genetic profile of the tumor in relation to response or resistance

other_outcome.time_frame: From screening through end of study
other_outcome.description: Tumor response will be assessed by irRECIST

other_outcome.time_frame: From screening through end of study
other_outcome.description: Assessed through questionnaires regarding quality of life, symptoms, pain, and health status

arm_group.description: Dose Escalation of MEDI0680 (AMP-514) and MEDI4736 in combination
Dose Expansion at selected dose from escalation phase

intervention.intervention_name: MEDI0680 (AMP-514): MEDI0680 and AMP-514 are interchangable nomenclature

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Must be 18 years or older
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status of 0-1
- Adequate organ function
Exclusion Criteria:
- Concurrent enrollment in another clinical study, unless in follow-up period or it is an observational study
- Concurrent chemotherapy, immunotherapy, biologic, or hormonal therapy for cancer treatment
